name: Forbes
text: OSI is firmly controlled by secretive billionaire Sheldon Lavin, the 88-year-old executive chairman who owns the vast majority of the $6.3 billion (estimated 2019 sales) business. “I have a talent for building enterprises,” said Lavin https://t.co/63R5RjRPwd by @chloesorvino https://t.co/Ltub0YFKQp
